groupdesc: Settings connected with the frontpage of the theme can be configured here.

fields.name: readmore_on_frontpage
fields.label: Show read more on the frontpage
fields.tooltip: Enable display of the frontpage button when you don't want to use the more quicktag.

fields.name: template_homepage_mainbody
fields.label: Widgets Display on Homepage
fields.tooltip: Enable the display of widgets in mainbody widget positions instead of standard blog posts on the homepage.

fields.name: slider_autoanimation
fields.label: Autoanimation for slides
fields.tooltip: Enable autoanimation of slides on homepage.

fields.name: slider_interval
fields.label: Animation interval
fields.tooltip: Specify the animation interval in ms.

fields.name: slider_speed
fields.label: Animation speed
fields.tooltip: Specify the speed of animation in ms.

fields.name: tab_autoanimation
fields.label: Autoanimation for tabs
fields.tooltip: Enable autoanimation of tabs on homepage.

fields.name: tab_interval
fields.label: Animation interval
fields.tooltip: Specify the animation interval in ms.
